info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 April 2024,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
Super clean, bright decor, and comfortable place. The location is ideal for foreign travelers with access to stores and restaurants within walking distance. We always felt safe and welcomed. Most of all, you cannot get any better considering the great quality and functionalities of this woderful place.
Thank you

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 February 2024,  路 Stayed about a week
rating_comment: The house is a ultra modern, well equipped, sparkling clean apartment in Gulshan -1 tucked in to a quieter corner of the road . This means there is a lot of calm when we want to rest but we are also near many restaurants /shopping outlets within walking distance . Best place for stay in a busy Dhaka . The house owner is very proactive and ensured the apartment is sparkling clean before our arrival and was responding immediately for any of our queries - this made us feel at home . We will surely come back same place when we visit Dhaka next time .
